About me

I am a self-taught Web Developer, currently focused on the Front-End of the Web.

Passionate

Software Development occupies #1 spot on my passion list for quite some time now, and I think it's not going to change any time soon. I'm also passionate, among other things, about Business Development, History, or Grand Strategy Games.

Active in the Community

I manage to keep up to date with modern practices and trends in Web Development by being a part of the Developer Community across various platforms, and I consider it essential to be a successful developer on my own.

Always Learning

I am a goal-oriented person, so to keep myself in check, I have developed a lifelong learning attitude, and it's no secret that this is the only way to bring constant value into the IT industry.

Tech Stack

This is the Tech Stack I am currently working with. My main goal is to constantly improve fluency with these technologies and eventually becoming a full-fledged Front-End Developer. While working on this stuff, I'm also expanding my knowledge of Web Design, UI/UX, and SEO.

Self Development

My long term objective is to start working with some of the technologies presented below and to make a smooth transition into a Full-Stack Web Developer. I am also interested in working on Genetic Algorithms sometime in the future, which certainly brings Machine Learning and AI to the table. As a Software Developer, learning new things is inevitable, and I believe that doing this at a reasonable pace makes the danger of becoming Jack of All Trades, Master of None not applicable.

Building great things is what makes us great

I agree
